name: Trial and Error (basic test)
description:
Trial and Error is a story I've been working on for a long time now, and am hoping to bring it to life one day. Obviously this is an extremely basic, buggy prototype and is not how I want it to end up as. 

In this game you play as a reaper known as Alec, and do simple puzzles like finding a key and walking through a maze to meet your boss, Gretchen.

This game does and will continue to contain profanity and mature themes including kidnapping, murder and suicide.
